attributes.action: ensure that Jet Black, drummer with The Stranglers, be included in the next list of honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For 33 years, Jet Black (born Brian Duffy) has been the drummer with the band The Stranglers. He is 69 years old in August and continues to tour with the band. He has recently battled illness and seems unstoppable. He is also a very talented programmer of electronic drum equipment and has designed a customised pedal to enable the bass drum to be positioned anywhere in the drum kit set-up.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that Jet Black, drummer with The Stranglers, be included in the next list of honours."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16612


Prime Minister's Office
